derivation: from G1 (ἄζυμος) (as a negative particle) and G2219 (ἄζυμος);
strongs_def: unleavened, i.e. (figuratively) uncorrupted; (in the neutral plural) specially (by implication) the Passover week
outline:
1. unfermented, free from leaven or yeast
    1. of the unleavened loaves used in the paschal feast of the Jews
    2. metaph. free from faults or the "leaven of iniquity"
